object_error_summary.message: Error Message: "The 'verticalCRS' element has no child elements." Error Message: "MD_DataIdentification: The topicCategory element is mandatory if hierarchyLevel is dataset."  Error Location: "/*[local-name()='MD_Metadata' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']"  Error Assert: "(not(gmd:hierarchyLevel) or (gmd:hierarchyLevel/*/@codeListValue = 'dataset')) and (gmd:identificationInfo/*/gmd:topicCategory) or gmd:hierarchyLevel/*/@codeListValue != 'dataset'":
